name: flights_bulk_search
description: Search multiple flight routes on Google Flights in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling flights_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass routes as comma-separated 'from-to' pairs. Example: 'NYC to London,NYC to Paris,NYC to Tokyo'.

parameters.name: routes
parameters.description: Comma-separated flight routes as 'from to destination' pairs (e.g. 'NYC to London,LA to Tokyo,Chicago to Miami')

steps.code: return `{{routes}}`.split(',').map(r => { const route = r.trim(); return { url: 'https://www.google.com/travel/flights?q=' + encodeURIComponent(route), route: route }; })
steps.name: items
steps.label: Build flight search URL list

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const flightCards = document.querySelectorAll('li.pIav2d, div[data-resultid], ul[role="list"] li'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(flightCards.length, 5); i++) { const card = flightCards[i]; const priceEl = card.querySelector('div.YMlIz span, span[data-gs], .price-text span, span[aria-label*="$"], span[aria-label*="EUR"]'); const airlineEl = card.querySelector('div.sSHqwe span, .airline-name span'); const timesEl = card.querySelectorAll('div.wtDYl span, span.mv1WYe'); const durationEl = card.querySelector('div.gvkrdb, div[aria-label*="duration"]'); const stopsEl = card.querySelector('div.EfT7Ae span, span[aria-label*="stop"]'); const times = []; timesEl.forEach(t => { const txt = t.textContent.trim(); if (txt.match(/\d{1,2}:\d{2}/) || txt.match(/\d{1,2}\s*(AM|PM)/i)) times.push(txt); }); results.push({ airline: airlineEl ? airlineEl.textContent.trim() : '', price: priceEl ? priceEl.textContent.trim() : '', departure_time: times[0] || '', arrival_time: times[1] || '', duration: durationEl ? durationEl.textContent.trim() : '', stops: stopsEl ? stopsEl.textContent.trim() : '' }); } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { route: params.get('q') || decodeURIComponent(window.location.href.split('q=')[1] || '').split('&')[0], result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: flight_results
detailSteps.label: Extract flight results
